title: Jeff Bezos Sells $10 Billion Amazon Stock in One Week – Biggest Insider Sale Ever
shortdescription: Bezos cashes out ahead of expected capital gains tax hike under new administration.
description: Amazon founder executes pre-planned 10b5-1 sale of 50 million shares — proceeds to fund Blue Origin and real estate empire.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Gold Hits $2,800/oz All-Time High – Safe Haven Demand Surges Amid Geopolitical Tensions
shortdescription: Central banks buy record 1,200 tons as US election uncertainty fuels flight to quality.
description: GLD ETF inflows top $10B in November alone – silver follows with 15% rally, platinum up 8%.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Ethereum 2.0 Final Upgrade Complete – Network Processes 100,000 Transactions Per Second
shortdescription: The Merge Part 2 brings instant finality and zero gas fees as ETH price surges 40% overnight.
description: Network now processes 100K TPS with near-zero fees — ETH price jumps 40% as scalability breakthrough completes.
author: Emma Chen

title: REITs Crash 35% in 2025: Is It Time to Buy the Dip?
shortdescription: Office and mall REITs hit decade lows — but data centers and industrial soaring.
description: VNQ down 35% YTD while data center REITs like DLR and EQIX hit all-time highs — biggest sector divergence ever.
author: Mark Blaze

title: January Jobs Report: Hiring Tops Expectations as Unemployment Falls to 4.3%
shortdescription: The US added 130,000 jobs in January 2026, beating forecasts as unemployment fell to 4.3%. Strong headlines mask weak trends and heavy 2025 revisions.
description: US labor market surprises with 130K jobs, but 2025 revisions reveal weakness. Hiring tops expectations as unemployment falls to 4.3% while warning signs remain.
author: Macro Anton
